sect1.title: {html_select_time}
sect1.para: {html_select_time} is a custom function that creates time dropdowns for you. It can display any or all of hour, minute, second and meridian.
The time attribute can have different formats. It can be a unique timestamp, a string of the format YYYYMMDDHHMMSS or a string that is parseable by PHP's strtotime().
